'''Colin Cooke''' is the husband of [[Sarah Cooke]].

==History==
Colin's wife, Sarah, was pregnant. The baby had been diagnosed in utero with hypoplastic left-heart syndrome and needed a heart transplant shortly after birth. When a heart became available, they delivered the baby four weeks early and rushed her into her transplant surgery. Despite a complication, the transplant was successful and Sarah and Colin were able to see their baby in the NICU after her surgery.

==Relationships==
===Romantic===
He is married to [[Sarah Cooke]].

===Familial===
His daughter was diagnosed in utero with hypoplastic left-heart syndrome and had a heart transplant shortly after birth.
